title: WTB Roger Connor, a cabinet HOF & others .. please see inside!

posts.post_title: WTB Roger Connor, a cabinet HOF & others .. please see inside!
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the following in lower but presentable condition: 

Roger Connor (any)
Ed Delehanty (any)
Anson, Glasscock & Brouthers Goodwins
Cabinet (Old Judge or otherwise) of a prominent player
Shoeless Joe Jackson
Green Cy Young portrait

Let's see what ya got!
